solution_line_template: In the third grade, there are <<{students_3rd_grade}={students_3rd_grade}>>{students_3rd_grade} students
In the fourth grade, there are {multiplier_4th_grade} * {students_3rd_grade} = <<{multiplier_4th_grade}*{students_3rd_grade}={students_4th_grade}>>{students_4th_grade} students
Counting the boys and girls in the second grade, there are {boys_2nd_grade} + {girls_2nd_grade} = <<{boys_2nd_grade}+{girls_2nd_grade}={students_2nd_grade}>>{students_2nd_grade}.
